attributes.action: Give consent for another Scottish Independence Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
They want to be independent,  let them. Why should the rest of the UK fund them? They have free University fees and NHS prescriptions.
Say YES to the rest of UK NOT funding these privileges.
attributes.background: Allow Scotland to leave the UK ASAP

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572629
